website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, steel tool enables you to stretch your calves while lying on your back, which eliminates the risk of falling or back injuries that can come with stretching.
pros: Stretches calf and hamstring at the same time
Stretch lying on your back with your knee straight
Lightweight steel frame with heavy-duty construction
cons: Handle is not designed very well

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: The physical therapy clinic where I went for knee therapy had me using this for my hamstrings as they were so tight. It made a good difference in the back pain and leg pain I was experiencing. I purchased one so I could use it at home. It works very well. I recommend that when you are using this, you make certain your back is pushed down to the surface you are laying on and your core muscles are tightened. This will give you an extra benefit from using it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beauman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product for post knee replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I had knee replacement October 10, 2018. Today is February 27, 2019. I could not straighten my leg after my second surgery to debride my joint of a nosocomial infection. This has gone on since November 7, 2016. In one day I was able to not only get my leg straight but was able to touch my heel to the floor. As of February 25, 2019. I was not able to achieve this with in hospital rehabilitation, outpatient physical therapy, or in hospital rehabilitation. In two days I went from no weight on my leg to weight bearing b cause my leg was finally straight enough to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Harold A. Libka

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but poor quality. Spring "buttons" which hold the metal tubing together, broke within a few months. Strange as I had put it together and never took apart, so apparently defective buttons, or just trying to save pennies on production. Requires fair amount of arm strength to keep leg straight, which then causes thin tubing to flex. At some point I expect the flexing will cause it to break, or bend permanently. The device does work, but should be priced about $15-20 for the poor tubing used.
customer_reviews.author: Just1Man

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home PT
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my left knee that frequently causes hamstring pain and I have bursitis in my right hip that manifests as back and groin pain. It's been really important for me to stretch correctly and every day in order to stay as pain free as possible. I tend to have trouble stretching these very areas and this device has helped quite a bit in only the few days I've had it. It's very easy to get my leg in the correct position and hold onto the other end. I'm very short and definitely shorter from the waist down and I haven't had a problem using this device at all.
customer_reviews.author: MereseydotesTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: It is adjustable for people of different heights and at the same time can be easily dismantled for transport if desired
customer_reviews.text: This device is saving my butt literally. I have always suffered from tight calf muscles causing me to stand with my knees locked starting when I was a kid. Now that I'm getting older ignoring the problem is no longer an option as it is starting to create lower back problems. Especially since I moved into a location with lots of stairs. Not only does it simply and effectively address the problem, the construction is very solid and should last under normal circumstances for years and years to come. It is adjustable for people of different heights and at the same time can be easily dismantled for transport if desired. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Pathwise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from tight hamstrings...this is the cure. This thing is superior to using a strap and is the closest thing that I have found to partner assisted stretching. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for me, and while the device works for stretching your hamstrings in particular, when you factor in the pricetag it's just not worth the money. You can use bands or even a towel. The rigid structure will give you more control over the stretch, however at $50+ its too cost prohibitive IMO.
customer_reviews.author: El Presidente

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Works
customer_reviews.text: You are paying for the technology here and not for the actual materials used. Just like most people, I feel the price is a bit steep. However, it does the job a whole lot better than using bands, belts, or straps. Easier on the hands to hold the bar. I watched the simple videos on YouTube. I would give this 5 stars if it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have very tight hamstrings, it may not be helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty flexible but not as much as I used to be. I wanted to regain some of flexibility and get a deep stretch. This device would probably help someone with really tight hamstrings, but it was more of an obstacle to me. Maybe I wasn't using it right...? I get better stretches without it, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Hester P.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize how tight my hamstrings were......
customer_reviews.text: until I used this device. Don't get me wrong, I knew I had tight hamstrings but NOT THIS TIGHT. This device makes it harder to 'cheat' the stretch. Since you lay on the floor, your back is automatically flat, not curved. Since it helps keep your knee straight, it makes it hard to do that subtle bend you would do to balance as if you were doing a standing hamstring stretch. Had it only for a few days now so I cannot say that they are not crazy tight anymore but hopefully by summer they won't be!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LTC R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be a meathead
customer_reviews.text: Yeah,I am kinda a meathead and it had been YEARS since I stretched anything other than mouth when yawning.... Anyway, I thought I would muscle my way through using this thing. OUCH the next day and the next and the next. Fortunately, I read and read some more and then stretched CORRECTLY, which for somebody who hasn't stretched in years means SLOW & only to the point of feeling the stretch without ANY pain. So, if you like me, then when you get this thing, just take it REAL SLOW for a few weeks, but now it has been two weeks and I am LOVING this thingL)
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: This device is great. I had knee replacement, used it with my physical therapist, bought one for home, and it has greatly helped improved my range of motion. It's very easy to use and hurts soooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to help stretch my hamstrings (obviously) after a groin strain and getting some guidance from a physical therapist. This really helped stretch the hamstrings effectively. I'm very impressed. It looks like it will last forever. I'm a pretty big guy (6'4") and it works really well for me. I would think it would work well for anyone at any size. It is adjustable. The whole thing is pretty comfy to be in and I can really get a good hamstring stretch in with this, plus I use it for a couple of other things. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Conway Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age – you won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 60 year old boss so he could better mamange to keep his hips level on the ground while stretching his legs. The handle is brilliant. I tested it out when I first bought it and will order a second for myself soon. You can so easily keep your knee and ankle stable, whilst getting a really great stretch through the hips. Excellent invention, I highly recommend it for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Buy the ideal mstretch with the video.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ideal stretch without the video by mistake. I tried to go to idealstretch.com to see if i could buy a video. Apoarently, its impossible to connect to their website. The device was recommended by my knee surgeon after tkr. I can see it stabilizing and straightening my leg. Adjusting the level by pressing down on the little silver balls is extremely difficult. Easystretch is not so easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Henke

customer_reviews.title: Tenderize those tight hamstrings screaming for help!
customer_reviews.text: The best hsmstring torture device I didn't know existed. Perfect for stretching those iron like hammies with perfect form. I can feel the muscle midway up my back trying sometime. I can now almoat do full splits as well at 52 years old. Huge disbelief accomplishment for me. Take it easy. A little at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking at a 50$ tool to stretch your legs, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: providing hamstring relief
customer_reviews.text: My hobby is weight lifting. I pulled a hamstring three months ago, and have been having difficulty ever since. Using this is providing relief, and ease of walking. I have only used it for 2 days so far, but it is very promising for me. BTW, I am 62. i did not get the DVD -- but plenty of videos are on Youtube, and the pictures are enough to help
customer_reviews.author: Wally s

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is a genius!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had low back pain (sciatica) for years. My daughter is a PTA and highly recommended this apparatus to me. She uses it at her job. Apparently I have tight hamstrings and that causes much of my pain. This machine keeps my legs in the proper position for maximum stretching. Works REALLY well for me. I have very little to no pain. I’m sold!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicci Allen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stretches You Out
customer_reviews.text: I bought the IdealStretch Original Hamstring Stretching Device with Instruction Card for restless leg syndrome because I feel when I stretch my Hammies out it helps me sleep better. This definitely will stretch you out and stretch your hamstrings with a minimum of effort. If you're innovative you can use it to do all kinds of other stretches as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Stretching feels good
customer_reviews.text: I love to stretch. Ideally, I would have a full stretching machine in my home. Bur for space, this hamstring device serves a purpose. It's easy to use and is sturdy. It works great. Once you use it, you'll see that it stretches more than the legs. The whole body is connected so you'll feel a release in other parts of the body as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching and strengthening the knee after knee surgery.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to help straighten my knee after meniscus surgery. I used one of these at physical therapy and decided to purchase so I could continue my exercises at home. Very easy to use and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Hip pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have had SI joint pain for 15 years. I used this device and have been pain free for 3 days. It only takes 10 minutes a day. So happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sally K.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound prouduct
customer_reviews.text: im about 250, and this thing holds my weight fine. I used this in physical therapy first after i had surgery and now i use it daily in the morning it makes a world of difference. the product is well built given its pricey for what it is but i couldnt find another one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get a good stretch until I tried this device. Simple to use, it gives you the leverage you need, all the while allowing you to be in a comfortable position. One reviewer mentioned he wished it was longer as he is tall. Well I'm 6'3" and found it very comfortable to use in the extended position. On top of that it is very sturdy. Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Definitely. I would say to start out easy on the stretching, as like anything else you can overdo it. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Good

customer_reviews.title: How is this not more popular???
customer_reviews.text: Seriously; why does nobody know about this thing? I freaking love it. It stretches what I cant and I can FEEL it. If you're on the fence about buying this, trust me it's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient way to get a great stretch!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for knee/hamstring rehab - it rocks!!
customer_reviews.author: john r. harmon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and pretty effective
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty darn good. It's easy to use and works well. I can stretch my hamstrings, but I can't stretch them as far as someone pushing my leg for me. If it went that far it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schurr

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer following Total Knee Replacement Surgery
customer_reviews.text: My orthopaedic surgeon loaned me the IdealStretch at my first post-op appointment. My physical therapist had not heard of it, but was impressed by it. During my last post op appointment, the surgeon said he was sure the IdealStretch made the difference in my ability to completely straighten out my knee. I ordered my own to maintain the great results.
customer_reviews.author: Rita G.

customer_reviews.title: Effective so far
customer_reviews.text: I had knee replacement surgery six months ago and have since had problems straightening my knee. Two separate physical therapists have urged me to use this product. I feel it will be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W

customer_reviews.title: Tools of the healing trade
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of metal to equip a person with stretching under a tight schedule and small spaces. Last year I broke my leg and could not walk properly and this item helps immensely
customer_reviews.author: Glenna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: It works but its not easy!
customer_reviews.text: Depending on how stiff you are (really stiff in my case from lots of running) the gains will come a lot slower than you'd like. But they do come. I worked on my flexibility for over a month and did see benefit, but it was SLOW. So don't expect miracles. Still this is way more effective then the standard exercises (leg against the wall). My guess is expect 3+ months then the need to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful stretcher
customer_reviews.text: I first found out about this item at physical therapy. It is great to have at home to stretch and improve well being at home. Quite worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this a long time ago! I needed a complete knee replacement so I was trying to stretch and get my knee in the best pre condition possible going in to surgery. This helped 100%. It helped the post physical therapy and the knee replacement went great. Range of motion is super important in full recovery. This definitely helped that. I'll be having the other knee done soon and thank goodness I have this.
customer_reviews.author: researcher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Feels like its not sturdy but will work. Probably wont break but feels fragile. I got tight everything basically so it feels good esp ham calf area.
customer_reviews.author: jimishmong

customer_reviews.title: Necessary to improve knee extension post surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Simple concept and use that is most beneficial in regaining knee range of motion post surgery.
customer_reviews.author: James Borneo

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: We are very athletic and use this daily to get a great hamstring stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Ronick

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of therapy equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Following a knee replacement surgery.I was having problems with extension. My therapist had one of the Ideal Stretch pieces. I liked it so well, I decided to get one for myself. It enables me to get a good hamstring stretch without assistance. I use the Ideal Stretch twice twice daily.I will be taking it to show my surgeon so that he may recommend it to patients with similar post surgery problems.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for stretching alone
customer_reviews.text: I need to do a variety of stretching during a workout to help my spine and lower back. Hamstring streching is a very important part of this however it is difficult to do without help. This device is actually quite helpful for when I don't have anyone to help stretch me. It is very simple to use and very light weight. My only issue, and why I give it 4 instead of 5 stars, is that for me, at six feet tall, it feels just a little to short. It does have three adjustment settings on the length but they are too close together. Wish it were adjustable to to be about and inch or two longer.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. in D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have our patients use this at work to help stretch their hamstrings and improve knee extension, especially after surgery. It has been amazingly helpful. I got my mom to try and it and she loved it - so I ordered one for her for Christmas. We haven’t used the one I ordered (since Christmas is still a few weeks off) but I know she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: This is fire 🔥 🔥🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’3 my wife is 5’6 and the adjustability of this leg starcher works for the both us.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Stretching
customer_reviews.text: This device has made stretching for me much easier, since I can do it lying on my bed. Thank you for the great product. My Chiropractor thought it was a very good fit for me, very practical.
customer_reviews.author: justthething

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing only works WHEN YOU USE IT. And when you do it works. Really helps the back and legs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fair View

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. I purchased it because I'm a little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I purchased it because I'm a little stiff in the hamstrings. I needed something to help me get limber. It's not the only think I use to get limber, but this along with other stretches has helped do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: No deep stretch for  me
customer_reviews.text: If you can put your leg up on a table and hold it straight, that's about the extent of what this machine does. I'm 49 and can get my nose close to my knee for a deep stretch. This machine cannot do that for you.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and makes it super easy to stretch your hamstrings while not putting any pressure on your lower back
customer_reviews.author: mnation

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool for hamstrings
customer_reviews.text: Great stretching tool. Had 2 back surgeries in 2 years and hamstrings were so tight
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: My Physical therapist uses this when I'm working with her and so I purchased one for home. I love it and so do my boys.
customer_reviews.author: LilyBell

customer_reviews.title: Missing middle strap
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a defective product because the middle strap was missing. Useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared R. Barts

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Stretch Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stretch out my calf muscles and hamstrings. I've been using this at my local gym for a number of years and decided to purchase one for home use. Good decision, as the price was reasonable and I now can do the stretches whenever I want or need to.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia J. Petrovs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, best ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical regarding the IdealStretch and thought the price was very high. After using for over a year I can honestly say that my range and motion are vastly improved. As a runner, golfer and fitness addict I was never able to gain the flexibility needed even though I tried the "towel" and hamstring stretches. This unit will give you the best stretch ever and you will see improvement within a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: bobby t

customer_reviews.title: Great stretching equipment
customer_reviews.text: IdealStretch is a great way to stretch both hamstring and calf at the same time. My leg will not extend completely from a knee injury and my physical therapist used the the IdealStretch once, I really liked it then and always thought about getting one to use at home. The IdealStretch received is well built and very good quality. I highly recommend this product for stretching hamstrings and calfs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I have historically had flexibilitry issues with my hamstrings. This has helped alot.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Burton

customer_reviews.title: IdealStretch is easy to use and store!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always being reminded by my trainer to stretch before and after any workout or exercise. This device is so easy to use..and I can break it down and carry in my gym bag. Always with me...and I've noticed a definite improvement in my hamstrings as well as my lateral flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: DDK Catalina

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for hamstring stretch as part of a daily workout. More comfortable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: RonB

customer_reviews.title: Works well for stretching hamstrings
customer_reviews.text: Allows you to stretch hamstrings fairly well without needing to use a wall. It is easier to use on the floor than on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: TCommenter3

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for 2 day delivery for a specific reason. While it did arrive in 2 days, half of the device and instructions were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Innovative Stretching
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stretching tool. Great for kids and adults alike because it is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: First a word of warning: This shipment not only does not have a dvd, it doesn't contain instructions of any kind. Since the excellent stretches it enables could also injure if overdone, that is a bit scary. Fortunately, googling "IdealStretch" reveals instruction videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: James L Gillaspy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this product out for the first time, love it! I'm not very flexible so it's very hard for me too stretch my hamstrings, this piece of equipment makes it simple. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wallace

customer_reviews.title: My husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had back surgery...this definitely helps with stretching:
customer_reviews.author: Masa

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL! I stretch way more often now!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! Recommended by my chiropractor, I ordered this and it makes stretching so much more convenient and effective. Very portable too, so I often take it to work to use on breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bain

customer_reviews.title: This works so well on my hamstrings
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems that are caused by tight hamstrings and this device helps me stretch them out so easily. I use it daily while on the couch watching tv. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Derzon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a proper and safe hamstring strech.
customer_reviews.text: The device holds my leg straight and allows me to my back flat on the floor. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: ASSISTANCE WITH STRETCHING
customer_reviews.text: Works well to help me reach a better stretch for over-tight hamstrings while at the same time protecting my very sore, very inflamed achilles. Assists in performing the task more effectively than using a stretch band or towel under your foot.
customer_reviews.author: HitesMites

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Great Stretching Device
customer_reviews.text: My hamstrings are just the worst and so far I'm very impressed with this device. It was pricey but if it makes the difference i think it's going to make it's worthy every penny. I'm already feeling the benefits after only a few days. I hate stretching and this makes it much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it..need it
customer_reviews.text: Love it amazing!! I would recommend it for sure wish I bought it years ago. My leges are super tight. I hate stetching its hard this makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hamstring Stretch Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best hamstring stretch money can buy. I have tried everything and quite honestly, I wasn't too optimistic about this product when I initially placed the order. When I received the product, and tried it for the first time, it was awesome! I highly recommend it to anyone who needs to loosen the hamstring muscle. Take it from someone who generally would rather go to the dentist than take time out to stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Escobar

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s supposed to do—Stretch hamstrings.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a unit like the one I use at my therapist so I don’t have to go there for treatment—35 miles round trip.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my stretching equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because it was used in the PT office to help with the hyperextension of my knee and stretching of hamstring. I love this apparatus and so happy I purchased it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scot4life

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The idealtretch is a product that I wasn't aware of until it was necessary for me to have some physical therapy for an injury that I had been dealing with for two years. Thanks to this piece of equipment my injury has begun to heal, and I'm now more mobile, and in much less pain. The reasonable price ,and quick delivery were great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for knee replacement patients!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to my husband by his surgeon after he had a total knee replacement. This thing does it's job & allows the user to control the amount of force used. At first it looks like some sort of torture device, but it really does work fantastc. :)
customer_reviews.author: D.A..

customer_reviews.title: From a skeptic to a believer
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of this product at first. It seemed too simple to be effective. I had searched in vain for a hamstring stretching device, and finally bought this as a last resort -- thinking I could return it if it was not useful. Within minutes of trying it, I was convinced. I wished I had gotten it years earlier. This device allows a maximum of stretching in surprising comfort and total relaxation. It isolates the hamstrings, inverts the angle of the foot and knee, and maximizes the leg's flexibility. If you need a hamstring stretching device, this will not leave you disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. James C. Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for anyone who is getting knee replacement surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to stretch the hamstrings. Has knee replacement and this was a doctor recommended product. Worked really well
customer_reviews.author: patricia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product. Great value, easy to use, and sturdy construction. I find it much more effective than stretching bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamstrings tool
customer_reviews.text: This helps stretch my hamstrings before all my sporting events. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: stephen petroske

customer_reviews.title: THIS DEAL IS GREAT. I USED ONE AT THE PHYSICAL THERAPIST AND ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS DEAL IS GREAT. I USED ONE AT THE PHYSICAL THERAPIST AND HE TOLD ME WHERE TO GET IT. I HAD A KNEE REPLACEMENT 9 MONTHS AGO AND STILL USE IT ONCE IN A WHILE. IT REALLY, REALLY IS WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: connie j moser

customer_reviews.title: I need this apparatus to maintain my health. Upon ...
customer_reviews.text: I need this apparatus to maintain my health. Upon receiving the purchased item, I found one of the two pens that hold it together broken. I need a pen ASAP thanks Rita Rhodes
customer_reviews.author: Rita Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Happy ..
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and so far so good. Since I like to stretch my legs everyday this seemed like a great idea!! Though I think its over priced, it sure beats trying to convince your teenager to help you stretch your legs!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and spend long hours on my feet. My lack of flexibility increases my risk of injury so I decided to try Idealstretch and found that my sore back was helped by stretching with this. I ordered another one so I could stretch both legs at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: why didnt I buy it sooner
customer_reviews.text: This actually works and well. I have almost everything you can buy for sciatica hamstring tightness and stretching this is the only device that I know is working
customer_reviews.author: Mtncarver

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for years to become more flexible in part to help with low back problems. I started using this devise about a year ago and have tried to do about one hour of stretching five times per week. The results have been amazing. My range of motion for my lower back has increase over 30 degrees......this means that I can now touch my toes and even place my hands flat on the floor. Since using this my back issues are gone! Just lie down on the floor,watch tv and stretch for 30-60 minutes every day and your back problems are gone.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to use stretching device.
customer_reviews.text: Good design and very effective stretching device. Mainly use it for stretching my hamstrings after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is this a miracle ? Buy this item now !!!
customer_reviews.author: TANER

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is simple to use and delivers immediate positive results
customer_reviews.author: Domenick Luccarelli

customer_reviews.title: Better than rubber bands
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It keeps your leg straight during the stretch. Using rubber bands there is a tendency to relax your leg so you are not getting a real good stretch.Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Ham string gone loose
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a device that would allow me (without assistance) to stretch my Ham strings. This well engineered device does a great job, it's great to say the least. The construction is very sturdy and should make it last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Fischer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device for me after my surgery.  I will continue doing stretch exercises daily.
customer_reviews.text: Had knee replacement surgery. Used to stretch to keep my knee straight.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for performing hamstring stretches without putting any strain on the back - would highly recommmend
customer_reviews.author: Donald Holford

customer_reviews.title: Buy this wonderful hamstring saver!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my hamstrings! Makes it easy to have good form. Showed the gym manager and everyone’s hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my physical therapist and works great to stretch and keep muscles stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Patty F.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use equals more use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience. After knee replacement stretching is important to get your leg back in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stretching tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, helpful in stretching tight leg muscles. Easy to transport and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Larson

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet built to last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together. Patent# embroidered on the strap along with a picture instruction. Heavy duty rivets. This is something that will last for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and results come quickly
customer_reviews.text: It arrived two days after I ordered it and I really enjoy using it. My hamstrings are not as tight and my lower back pain has started to subside.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: The IdealStretch is a great way to compliment my physical therapy treatment post Total ...
customer_reviews.text: The IdealStretch is a great way to compliment my physical therapy treatment post Total knee replacement surgery. Its portability makes it very convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Intense!
customer_reviews.text: Great, really intense stretch. But I always seem to get lower back pain from stretching using this. Perhaps it is because of my pelvis being misaligned.
customer_reviews.author: John Hancock

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for stretching!
customer_reviews.text: My PT recommended this and I love it. Easy to use, I take it camping and on vacation. Such a great purchase and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Regina P Pylinski

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to use and store. Best tool yet for calf, hamstrings, and general leg stretching!
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Brenda Zawodniak

product_meta.title: IdealStretch-Original- Hamstring Stretching Device with Instruction Card - Ideal Leg Stretcher, No Need for A Stretching Partner, Maintains Proper Hip Orientation- Patented Leg Stretching
feature_bullets: HAMSTRING AND CALF STRETCHER: Most effective hamstring stretching device, stretching the hamstring and calf at the same time.

BACK AND KNEE STRETCHER: IdealStretch also relives tight and short Illio-Tibial (IT) band tissues, reducing lower back, knee, and lateral knee pain. Stretching the hamstrings relieves back pressure and pain.

SAFE: Bending over is a horrible way to stretch. IdealStretch uses the safest way, which is lying on your back with your knee straight, eliminating the pressure off of your spine and maintaining proper hip orientation.

MULTPLE STRETCHES SAME DEVICE: Hamstring, Hip, IT Band, and Groin stretches can all be performed using this single device. Highly effective for warmup, exercise, post-exercise, physical therapy and rehabilitation.
QUALITY: The light steel frame is made of the highest quality using heavy-duty construction.
